Cerebellum of WHS11.EditorialNote: Current delineation looks like it includes the dorsal cochlear nucleus in the medulla on the more anterior sections.  Needs review
Cerebellum of WHS11.Definition: Delineation of cerebellum in Waxholm mouse brain atlas, as seen in T1 and T2* weighted volumes.  As seen in transverse: texture, intensity and apparent line separates cerebellum from other anatomy.  Includes cerebellar cortex and deep cerebellar nuclei;  does not include cerebellar peduncles within the brainstem.
